title: Secret Jouju: Byeol-ui Boseog
synopsis:
Jouju is tasked with finding the hidden Joubijou, balancing good and evil in the celestial world with her dear friends Cindy, Stella, and the mysterious 'Rosa'. While getting back Joubijou from Lucy 'the treasure hunter', Jouju protects her family and friends from witches and navigates through a magical journey in order to become a true guardian of stars.

(Source: Prime Video)
